page.title: 09ALL SAINTS' CHURCH,SNELLAND
page.content:
All Saints' is an Anglican Church, the priest of which is in charge of 8 parishes - Snelland, Faldingworth, Buslingthorpe, Wickenby, Snarford, Holton-cum-Beckering, Friesthorpe and Lissington.
There are about 2 services a month in addition to the major festivals - Christmas, Easter, Harvest, etc. The annual church fete in the summer is supported by the majority of the village, not only the regular church goers.
There is a Mothers' Union shared between two parishes which has about 12 members. In general the church plays an important role in community life.
